author: CoolKid99
title: My Dial-Up Journey
content: Took 3 minutes to connect to AOL today. Mom picked up the phone and ruined everything. Classic.

author: GamerXtreme
title: Beating Oregon Trail
content: Finally made it to Oregon without dying of dysentery. Pioneers would be proud. RIP to 3 oxen.

author: GeoCityQueen
title: My Glitter Cursor Is Online!
content: Spent 4 hours updating my homepage. It now has sparkles, a MIDI soundtrack, AND a dancing baby gif.

author: ICQMeBro
title: Uh Oh!
content: The ICQ 'uh-oh!' sound is permanently burned into my brain. Please send help.

author: NapsterHero
title: Downloaded 1 Song in 2 Hours
content: Got the full version of 'Smells Like Teen Spirit'. Quality: potato. Worth it: absolutely.
